Record.ClassificationPath: Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Cardiomyopathies/Cardiomyopathy, Hypertrophic/Cardiomyopathy, Hypertrophic, Familial
Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities/Genetic Diseases, Inborn/Cardiomyopathy, Hypertrophic, Familial
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: An autosomal dominant inherited form of HYPERTROPHIC CARDIOMYOPATHY. It results from any of more than 50 mutations involving genes encoding contractile proteins such as VENTRICULAR MYOSINS; cardiac TROPONIN T; ALPHA-TROPOMYOSIN.
